title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 641 - Rate Setting For Non-state Providers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 641 - Rate Setting For Non-state Providers

State Regulations

Subpart 641-1 - Rates for Non-State Providers of Residential Habilitation in Community Residences, Including Individualized Residential Alternatives (IRAs), and for Non-State Providers of Day Habilitation (§ 641-1.1 to 641-1.9)

Subpart 641-2 - Rates For Non-state Providers Of Intermediate Care Facilities For Persons With Developmental Disabilities (§ 641-2.1 to 641-2.10)

Subpart 641-3 - Direct Support and Clinical Compensation Increases (§ 641-3.1 to 641-3.5)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 641

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law, §§13.09[b], 43.02

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
